fieldsOfStudy: Student Development, Student Affairs, Strategic Planning, University Law, Leadership

headline: Field Representative at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)

positions.description:
Generate form I-20 for potential F-1 student visa holders. 
Assist students in maintaining their visa status once they arrive in the U.S. and begin studying at Drexel University. 
Meet and advise students throughout the term on various subjects ranging from academics, personal matters, cultural matters, and studying at Drexel University's ELC.
Coordinate student health insurance for new and continuing students. 
Advise students on health insurance policy and procedures.  
Plan, create, and implement all new student orientations at the ELC. 
Plan and coordinate all welcome and final receptions for students and ELC staff. 
Plan, create, and coordinate all student activities at the ELC. Activities are meant for enjoyment, but also give students the chance to enhance their cultural experience at the ELC. 
Coordinate activities with other Drexel departments in order to create cultural and language exchanges for ELC and Drexel students. 
Act as lead administrator over the ELC facebook page.
positions.title: Assistant Director of Student Services

Worked in conjunction with Jecheon City recruiter to advise and educate new hires about living and working in Korea.         
Conceptualized and taught 24 night conversation classes for the Jecheon Girl's 
High School.
